DOC.brief_summary: This study compare two type diet intervention : low carbohydrate ketogenic diet ( Atkins ) low-fat diet combine medication ( Orlistat ) .
DOC.brief_title: A Low-Carbohydrate , Ketogenic Diet Versus Orlistat Weight Loss
DOC.detailed_description: Overweight obesity increasingly prevalent veteran population well general public . For patient obesity-associated illness , effective treatment option available fail attempt diet exercise , even though weight loss show alleviate condition . The purpose study compare tolerability , safety , efficacy low-carbohydrate ketogenic diet ( Atkins ) combination low-fat diet Orlistat . The outcome examine 48 week duration include body weight , risk factor heart disease ( e.g. , lipid profile ) , blood sugar . This randomized , parallel-intervention trial . Subjects ( n=150 ) recruit Durham VAMC Ambulatory Care Clinics . All patient receive one two intensive weight loss intervention .
